mapper.insert: insert into nuc_dida_attention (id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, fan_id, user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, fan_id, user_id from nuc_dida_attention
